title: Yume Keshou
sinopse:
A woman and a man stop and stare at each other in a crowd of people coming and going. In the hot air, they find each other in the pack, even though it's been eight years... A sad story of a man and a woman is being told somewhere in the city today.

(Source: Akita Shoten, translated)

Included One-shots:
Obasan wa Lesbian
Shirauo no Kawa
